testCases.title: Verify successful login with valid credentials
steps: Verify user is logged in successfully
testCases.expectedResult: User should be logged in and redirected to dashboard

testCases.title: Verify login page elements are visible
testCases.expectedResult: All login page elements should be visible

testCases.title: Verify login fails with invalid username
testCases.expectedResult: Login should fail and display appropriate error message

testCases.title: Verify login fails with invalid password
testCases.expectedResult: Login should fail and display appropriate error message

testCases.title: Verify login fails with empty username
testCases.expectedResult: Login should fail and display required field error

testCases.title: Verify login fails with empty password
testCases.expectedResult: Login should fail and display required field error

testCases.title: Verify login button state
steps: Verify login button is enabled/disabled based on form validation
testCases.expectedResult: Login button state should reflect form validation

testCases.title: Verify login page title
testCases.expectedResult: Page title should be 'ClaudeMD - Login' or similar
